ActivityStream.bodyActivityMyselfAddedToSafe: You linked this device to this account
ActivityStream.bodyExplainReceivedUBI: This is the Universal Basic Income minted with your own token. You receive circa {rate} per month.
ActivityStream.bodyExplainSecondary: All activities carry a small fee used to maintain the Circles network.
ActivityStream.bodyExplainMeTrustedSomeone: You trusted @{actor} which means that @{actor} can send you their tokens.
ActivityStream.bodyExplainMeUntrustedSomeone: You untrusted @{actor} which means that you don't accept any tokens anymore of them.
ActivityStream.bodyExplainTrustedBySomeone: @{actor} trusts you. You can send your token to them now.
ActivityStream.bodyExplainUntrustedBySomeone: @{actor} untrusts you which means that they don't accept your token anymore.
ActivityStream.bodyNothingHereYet: There are no activities to display yet

App.errorUpdate: Something went wrong, are you connected to the internet? {errorMessage}

BalanceDisplay.tooltipYourBalance: Your basic income is issued continuously at the rate of {rate} Circles a month.

CriticalError.bodyCriticalErrorDescription: Oh no! This looks bad. Your account seems to be corrupted and we can not recover from this current state.
CriticalError.bodyCriticalErrorTryAgain: Oh no! Something went wrong while loading your account. Please reload this page and try again.
CriticalError.dialogAreYouSure: Do you really want to reset this wallet? You will not be able to recover without a seed phrase.

Devices.dialogBurnDescription: Are you sure you want to end this session? You will not be able to restore your account unless you have a Seed Phrase!

DialogTrust.dialogTrustDescription: Are you sure you want to trust this person? Trusting someone is dangerous and can effect the security of the app. In order to stay safe only trust people you know.
DialogTrust.errorTrust: Something went wrong when you tried to trust @{username} ...

DialogTrustRevoke.dialogRevokeTrustDescription: Are you sure you want to revoke your trust with @{username}?
DialogTrustRevoke.errorRevokeTrust: Something went wrong when you tried to untrust @{username} ...
DialogTrustRevoke.successRevokeTrust: You successfully revoked your trust from @{username}!

Login.bodyUseThisQRCode: Scan QR code or copy device address to add this device to an already existing account:
Login.dialogBodySelector: Do you want to connect this device to the following accounts?

LoginSeedPhrase.bodyEnterYourSeedPhrase: Enter your seed phrase below to restore your wallet:
LoginSeedPhrase.errorRestoreFailed: Could not restore account. Is your seed phrase correct?

bodyMutualFriends.zero: You have no mututal friends in common with @{username}
bodyMutualFriends.one: You have one mututal friend in common with @{username}
bodyMutualFriends.other: You have {count} mutual friends in common with @{username}

NotFound.bodyNotFound: Ouch. We could not find the requested page. Did you maybe mistype the address?

Onboarding.bodyAvatar: Your photo is how your friends can search for you on the Circles App.
Onboarding.bodyEmail: We never share your email address and only use it to inform you about important changes to the platform.
Onboarding.bodySeedPhrase: This is your account password. Please save this somewhere private!
Onboarding.bodySeedPhraseChallenge: Please enter word {wordIndex} in your seed phrase:
Onboarding.bodyUsername: Your username is how your friends can search for you on the Circles App.
Onboarding.errorAvatarUpload: Could not upload image. Is it the right format and size?
Onboarding.errorSignup: Server error occurred during sign up. {errorMessage}
Onboarding.formUsernameInvalidFormat: Only basic characters and numbers (A-Z, 0-9) allowed, no symbols or whitespace, 3-24 characters
Onboarding.headingSeedPhraseChallenge: Did you save your Seed Phrase?
Onboarding.successOnboardingComplete: Your account was successfully created! Welcome!

Profile.shareText: Check out my Circles UBI profile!
Profile.tooltipSafeNotDeployed: This user did not complete their Circles account yet

SeedPhrase.bodyDescription: Print this and store it safely:

SendConfirm.bodyHowMuch: How much would you like to send?
SendConfirm.dialogSendDescription: Are you sure you want to send {amount} Circles to {username}?
SendConfirm.errorMessageTransfer: Could not transfer Circles as there is currently no complete trust path between {username} and you ..

Share.shareText: Hey! Check out my Circles UBI profile!

TutorialOnboarding.bodyBuildYourOwnEconomy: Circles has no central leadership, so itâ€™s yours to create with. You can invite friends and local businesses to Circles to support an alternative economy.
TutorialOnboarding.bodyUnconditionalIncome: Circles is designed similarly to a basic income. When you create a Circles account you are unconditionally issued Circles tokens on a regular basis.
TutorialOnboarding.bodyWebOfTrust: You can spend Circles with people you trust, and the people they trust.

Validation.bodyDoNotReset: Do not reset your browser or you will need to recover your data with your seed phrase.
Validation.bodyTrustDescriptionEmphasize: three people must trust your profile.
Validation.tooltipLeftTrustConnections: You need {connections} more trust connections before you can create your account

ValidationLock.bodyThisMayTakeMinutes: This may take a few minutes. Please keep your browser open.

ValidationShare.headingShowYourQR: Show your QR code or profile to others to receive trust.
ValidationShare.shareText: Hey! Check out my Circles profile!

ValidationStatus.bodyReadyForDeployment: Your account is ready now, click the button below to create it:

default.bodyEOLNotification: We're launching Circles officially 16.10. on the xDai network! Since this app is currently running on a test network your profile will be shut off on that same day. You will need to create a new profile for the official Circles network.
default.bodyStagingNotification: Please note that you're currently using Circles in a test network which is used by developers to experiment with the system. This means that errors can occur as we're experimenting with new unstable features, your Circles can only be used for testing and you can lose your profile, tokens and data anytime.
